summary: The Plastics are back in the long-awaited follow-up to the smash hit Mean Girls - and now the clique is more fashionable, funny, and ferocious than ever.
cast: Meaghan Martin|Donn Lamkin|Linden Ashby|Dan Coleman|Claire Holt|Patrick Johnson|Colin Dennard|Maiara Walsh|Nicole Gale Anderson|Bethany Anne Lind|Jennifer Stone|Tim Meadows|Mike Pniewski|Diego Boneta|Lil Bit|Rhoda Griffis|Amber Brooke|Juliet Kim|Willie Larson|Greg Perrow|Kimberly Banta|Rachel Filsoof|Katelyn E. Bulluck|Kelly Gilmore|Autumn Dial|Shaad Rashad|Codi Ann Amis|Tanner Baker|Kara Riann Brown|Edward Bryan|Tracy Campbell|Nilsa Castro|Arthur C. Chesser|Anna Cate Donelan|Tatum Etheridge|Carmen Matheny|Leah Monet|Natalie Murphey|Lyndsay Ricketson|Annie Tee
title: Chicas malas 2
